00229     enum Level
00230     {
00231         DEBUG_LEVEL = 0,
00232         WARNING_LEVEL = 1,
00233         ERROR_LEVEL = 2,
00234 
00235         LEVEL_COUNT
00236     };
00237 
00239     typedef IFunctor3<FUError::Level, uint32, uint32, void> FUErrorFunctor;
00240

00260     static bool Error(FUError::Level errorLevel, uint32 errorCode, uint32 line = 0);
00261 
00265     static void AddErrorCallback(FUError::Level errorLevel, FUErrorFunctor* callback);
00266 
00271     template <class Class>
00272     static void AddErrorCallback(FUError::Level errorLevel, Class* handle, void (Class::*_function)(FUError::Level, uint32, uint32))
00273     {
00274         AddErrorCallback(errorLevel, new FUFunctor3<Class, FUError::Level, uint32, uint32, void>(handle, _function));
00275     }
00276 
00280     static void AddErrorCallback(FUError::Level errorLevel, void (*_function)(FUError::Level, uint32, uint32))
00281     {
00282         AddErrorCallback(errorLevel, new FUStaticFunctor3<FUError::Level, uint32, uint32, void>(_function));
00283     }
00284 
00289     static void RemoveErrorCallback(FUError::Level errorLevel, void* object, void* function);
00290 
00295     template <class Class>
00296     static void RemoveErrorCallback(FUError::Level errorLevel, Class* handle, void (Class::*_function)(FUError::Level, uint32, uint32))
00297     {
00298         void* function = *(void**)(size_t)&_function;
00299         RemoveErrorCallback(errorLevel, (void*) handle, function);
00300     }
00301 
00305     static void RemoveErrorCallback(FUError::Level errorLevel, void (*_function)(FUError::Level, uint32, uint32))
00306     {
00307         void* function = *(void**)(size_t)&_function;
00308         RemoveErrorCallback(errorLevel, NULL, function);
00309     }

00338 {
00339 private:
00340     FUSStringBuilder message;
